sense.name: hang in or as if in the air
sense.examples: The craft hovered just inches above the ground. She hovered with vibrating wings above the nest.

sense.name: move to and fro around a particular point or points, remain near
sense.examples: His brother hovered annoyingly at his bedside. She hovered like a benevolent angel watching over me as I grew up. For many days he hovered between life and death. The prime rate has been hovering around 6 percent.
